examples.korean: The island was originally circular in shape. 발음듣기 그 섬은 원래 형태가 원형이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The island was originally circular in shape. 발음

examples.korean: We had seats in the circle. 발음듣기 우리 자리는 원형 관람석 내에 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We had seats in the circle. 발음

examples.korean: Squares, circles and triangles are types of shape. 발음듣기 (정)사각형, 원형, 삼각형은 형태의 종류들이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Squares, circles and triangles are types of shape. 발음

examples.korean: Chairs in rows are not as conducive to discussion as chairs arranged in a circle. 발음듣기 토론을 하는 데는 의자를 줄줄이 놓는 것이 의자를 원형으로 놓는 것만큼 안 좋다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Chairs in rows are not as conducive to discussion as chairs arranged in a circle. 발음

examples.korean: We can speculate that the stone circles were used in some sort of pagan ceremony. 발음듣기 우리는 그 돌로 된 원형이 어떤 종류의 이교도적 의식에 사용되었으리라는 추측을 할 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We can speculate that the stone circles were used in some sort of pagan ceremony. 발음
